name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Identifiers assigned to this event performer or other systems.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Identifiers assigned to this event performer or other systems.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this event performer or other systems.

name: $definitionUri
desc: Returns: References the (external) source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

name: $adddefinitionUri
desc: References the (external) source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: References the (external) source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

name: $definitionCanonical
desc: Returns: References the source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

name: $adddefinitionCanonical
desc: References the source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: References the source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The current state of the ChargeItem.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The current state of the ChargeItem.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: ChargeItems can be grouped to larger ChargeItems covering the whole set.

name: $addpartOf
desc: ChargeItems can be grouped to larger ChargeItems covering the whole set.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: ChargeItems can be grouped to larger ChargeItems covering the whole set.

name: $code
desc: Returns: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The individual or set of individuals the action is being or was performed on.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual or set of individuals the action is being or was performed on.

name: $context
desc: Returns: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this event.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

name: $addperformer
desc: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

name: $performingOrganization
desc: Returns: The organization requesting the service.

name: $requestingOrganization
desc: Returns: The organization performing the service.

name: $costCenter
desc: Returns: The financial cost center permits the tracking of charge attribution.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The financial cost center permits the tracking of charge attribution.

name: $quantity
desc: Returns: Quantity of which the charge item has been serviced.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Quantity of which the charge item has been serviced.

name: $bodysite
desc: Returns: The anatomical location where the related service has been applied.

name: $addbodysite
desc: The anatomical location where the related service has been applied.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The anatomical location where the related service has been applied.

name: $factorOverride
desc: Returns: Factor overriding the factor determined by the rules associated with the code.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Factor overriding the factor determined by the rules associated with the code.

name: $priceOverride
desc: Returns: Total price of the charge overriding the list price associated with the code.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Total price of the charge overriding the list price associated with the code.

name: $overrideReason
desc: Returns: If the list price or the rule-based factor associated with the code is overridden, this attribute can capture a text to indicate the  reason for this action.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If the list price or the rule-based factor associated with the code is overridden, this attribute can capture a text to indicate the  reason for this action.

name: $enterer
desc: Returns: The device, practitioner, etc. who entered the charge item.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The device, practitioner, etc. who entered the charge item.

name: $enteredDate
desc: Returns: Date the charge item was entered.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Date the charge item was entered.

name: $reason
desc: Returns: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

name: $addreason
desc: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

name: $service
desc: Returns: Indicated the rendered service that caused this charge.

name: $addservice
desc: Indicated the rendered service that caused this charge.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicated the rendered service that caused this charge.

name: $account
desc: Returns: Account into which this ChargeItems belongs.

name: $addaccount
desc: Account into which this ChargeItems belongs.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Account into which this ChargeItems belongs.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Comments made about the event by the performer, subject or other participants.

name: $addnote
desc: Comments made about the event by the performer, subject or other participants.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Comments made about the event by the performer, subject or other participants.

name: $supportingInformation
desc: Returns: Further information supporting this charge.

name: $addsupportingInformation
desc: Further information supporting this charge.
